entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
